writer.name: 拉格纳·布拉加松 Ragnar Bragason

introduction: In a desperate attempt to win back Karen, his childhood sweetheart, Halli, a DJ from Reykjavik, becomes a tour guide in Majorca, where Karen is shooting a documentary about a beauty pageant. Herding a group of Icelandic tourists on a Majorca package holiday, Halli is a fish out of water, having never been abroad before. Moreover, Karen shows up on the trip with her Danish boyfriend Christian.
